00034 namespace detail {
00035   class value_and_error {
00036   public:
00037     value_and_error()
00038       : valid_(false)
00039       , value_(0.0)
00040       , rms_value_(1e10) {}
00041 
00042     value_and_error(double value,
00043                     double rms_value)
00044       : valid_(true)
00045       , value_(value)
00046       , rms_value_(rms_value) {}
00047 
00048     bool valid() const { return valid_; }
00049     double value() const { return value_; }
00050     double rms_value() const { return rms_value_; }
00051     value_and_error& set_rms_value(double rms) {
00052       rms_value_ = rms;
00053       return *this;
00054     }
00055     value_and_error& operator*=(double f) {
00056       value_     *= f;
00057       rms_value_ *= f;
00058       return *this;
00059     }
00060     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const value_and_error& ve) {
00061       if (not ve.valid()) return os << "(invalid)";
00062       return os << "( " << std::setprecision(15) << ve.value() << " +- " << ve.rms_value() << ")";
00063     }
00064 
00065   private:
00066     bool   valid_;
00067     double value_;
00068     double rms_value_;
00069   } ;

00071   class gf_with_phase_hist : public boost::noncopyable {
00072   public:
00073     typedef boost::shared_ptr<gf_with_phase_hist> sptr;
00074     typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00075     typedef goertzel<complex_type> goertzel_type;
00076 
00077     struct phase_data {
00078       phase_data(size_t dt=0,
00079                  double df=0,
00080                  double phase=0)
00081         : dt_(dt)
00082         , df_(df)
00083         , phase_(phase) {}
00084 
00085       size_t dt() const { return dt_; }
00086       double df() const { return df_; }
00087       double phase() const { return phase_; }
00088 
00089       size_t dt_;    // time interval
00090       double df_;    // frequency offset
00091       double phase_; // phase [rad]
00092     } ;
00093     typedef std::deque<phase_data> phase_vector_t;
00094 
00095     virtual ~gf_with_phase_hist() {}
00096 
00097     static sptr make(std::string name, double kN, size_t period, size_t max_hist_size) {
00098       return sptr(new gf_with_phase_hist(name, kN, period, max_hist_size));
00099     }
00100 
00101     void set_df(double df) { df_ = df; }
00102 
00103     // idx_exclude < 0: no value is excluded
00104     detail::value_and_error compute_f_est(const std::vector<double>& dfs, int idx_exclude) const {
00105       // compute mean and rms
00106       double  sum_1(0), sum_x(0), sum_xx(0);
00107       for (size_t idx(0); idx<dfs.size(); ++idx) {
00108         if (int(idx) == idx_exclude) continue;
00109         const double df(dfs[idx]);
00110         sum_1  += 1;
00111         sum_x  += df;
00112         sum_xx += df*df;
00113       }
00114       const double df(sum_x/sum_1);
00115       const double rms_df(sum_1 > 1. ? sqrt(sum_xx/sum_1-df*df) : 0.0);
00116       return detail::value_and_error(filter_.kN()+df, rms_df);
00117     }
00118 
00119     // integrity method:
00120     //  - detects single outliers
00121     detail::value_and_error compute_f_est(const std::vector<double>& dfs) const {
00122       std::vector<detail::value_and_error> rms(dfs.size());
00123       int min_idx(-1);
00124       // outlier detection only with >=5 measurements:
00125       if (dfs.size() > 4) {
00126         rms[0] = compute_f_est(dfs, 0);
00127         double min_val(rms[0].rms_value());
00128         min_idx = 0;
00129         for (size_t i(1); i<dfs.size(); ++i) {
00130           rms[i] = compute_f_est(dfs, i);
00131           if (rms[i].rms_value() < min_val) {
00132             min_val = rms[i].rms_value();
00133             min_idx = i;
00134           }
00135         }
00136 
00137         // test if deviation is significant: ...
00138         double sum_1 (0);
00139         double sum_x (0);
00140         double sum_xx(0);
00141         for (size_t i(0); i<dfs.size(); ++i) {
00142           if (int(i) == min_idx) continue;
00143           const double x(rms[i].rms_value());
00144           sum_1  += 1;
00145           sum_x  += x;
00146           sum_xx += x*x;
00147         }
00148         const double mean_of_rms(sum_x/sum_1);
00149         const double rms_of_rms(sqrt(sum_xx/sum_1 - mean_of_rms*mean_of_rms));
00150         if (std::abs(min_val - mean_of_rms) < 3*rms_of_rms)
00151           min_idx = -1;
00152       }
00153       return compute_f_est(dfs, min_idx);
00154     }
00155 
00156     value_and_error compute_f_est() const {
00157       if (phase_vector_.empty()) {
00158         return value_and_error(0,0);
00159       }
00160 
00161       // make up vector with delta_fs
00162       std::vector<double> dfs(phase_vector_.size() -1);
00163       size_t counter(0);
00164       for (phase_vector_t::const_iterator i(phase_vector_.begin()), j(i+1);
00165            i != phase_vector_.end() && j != phase_vector_.end(); ++i, ++j, ++counter) {
00166         // time difference (Note: each measurement is made in the middle of its time interval!)
00167         const double dt(0.5*(i->dt() + j->dt()));
00168         // phase advance: each phase is ambiguous modulo df*2*M_PI TODO
00169         const double dphase(j->phase() - i->phase());
00170         dfs[counter] = j->df() + dphase/dt/(2*M_PI);
00171         if (i->df() != j->df() && counter>0)
00172           dfs[counter-1] += (j->df() - i->df());
00173 
00174         std::cout << str(boost::format("\t%4d %9.3f %8.4e %15.10f (%.10f %.10f) %15.10f %15.10f\n")
00175                          % j->dt()
00176                          % j->phase()
00177                          % dfs[counter]
00178                          % filter_.kN()
00179                          % i->df()
00180                          % j->df()
00181                          % (j->df() + dphase/dt/(2*M_PI))
00182                          % (filter_.kN() +j->df() + dphase/dt/(2*M_PI))
00183                          );
00184       }
00185       if (dfs.empty())
00186         return value_and_error(0,0);
00187 
00188       // apply integrity method
00189       return compute_f_est(dfs);
00190     }
00191 
00192     void dump(size_t ccounter) const {
00193       if (phase_vector_.empty())
00194         return;
00195       
00196       const value_and_error f_est(compute_f_est());
00197       // std::cout << "f_est = " << ccounter << " " << f_est << std::endl;
00198     }
00199 
00200     bool update(complex_type sample) {      
00201       filter_.update(sample);
00202       ++sample_counter_;
00203 
00204       bool phase_updated(false);
00205       if (sample_counter_ == period_) {
00206         while (history_size() > max_hist_size_)
00207           phase_vector_.pop_front();
00208     
00209         const double phase(std::arg(filter_.x()));
00210         last_amplitude_ = std::abs(filter_.x());
00211         // phase unwrapping
00212         if (!phase_vector_.empty()) {
00213           const double dphase(phase - last_phase_);
00214           if (dphase >  M_PI) offset_ -= 2*M_PI;
00215           if (dphase < -M_PI) offset_ += 2*M_PI;
00216         }
00217         phase_vector_.push_back(phase_data(period_, df_, offset_ + phase));
00218         last_phase_= phase;
00219         phase_updated= true;
00220         reset();
00221       }
00222       last_sample_ = sample;
00223       return phase_updated;
00224     }
00225 
00226     // length of phase history
00227     size_t size() const {
00228       return phase_vector_.size();
00229     }
00230     // size in samples
00231     size_t history_size() const {
00232       size_t s(0);
00233       BOOST_FOREACH(const phase_vector_t::value_type& v, phase_vector_)
00234         s += v.dt();
00235       return s;
00236     }
00237     size_t period() const { return period_; }
00238     double amplitude() const { return last_amplitude_; }
00239     double kN() const { return filter_.kN(); }
00240 
00241     void reset(std::string name="") {
00242       if (name != "")
00243         name_ = name;
00244       filter_.reset();
00245       sample_counter_ = 0;
00246     }
00247     void update(double kN, size_t period) {
00248       period_ = period;
00249       if (filter_.kN() != kN) {
00250         filter_ = goertzel_type(kN);
00251         phase_vector_.clear();
00252       }
00253       reset();
00254     }
00255 
00256   protected:
00257   private:
00258     gf_with_phase_hist(std::string name, double kN, size_t period, size_t max_hist_size)
00259       : name_(name)
00260       , filter_(kN)
00261       , period_(period)
00262       , max_hist_size_(max_hist_size)
00263       , sample_counter_(0)
00264       , offset_(0)
00265       , last_amplitude_(0)
00266       , last_phase_(0)
00267       , last_sample_(0)
00268       , inhibit_reset_(false)
00269       , df_(0) {}
00270     
00271     std::string     name_;
00272     goertzel_type   filter_;
00273     phase_vector_t  phase_vector_;
00274     size_t          period_;         // in samples
00275     const size_t    max_hist_size_;  // in samples
00276     size_t          sample_counter_;
00277     double          offset_;
00278     double          last_amplitude_;
00279     double          last_phase_;
00280     complex_type    last_sample_;
00281     bool            inhibit_reset_;
00282     double          df_; // shift in frequency
00283   } ;
00284 
00285 } // namespace detail
00286 
00287 class tracking_goertzel_filter : private boost::noncopyable {
00288 public:
00289   typedef boost::shared_ptr<tracking_goertzel_filter> sptr;
00290 
00291   struct state {
00292     typedef enum {
00293       UNDEFINED  = 0,
00294       PEAK       = 1,
00295       MOVE_RIGHT = 2,
00296       MOVE_LEFT  = 3,
00297       REST       = 4,
00298       NUM_STATES
00299     } state_t;
00300   } ;
00301   static std::string state2str(state::state_t s) {
00302     static std::string stab[] = { "UNDEFINED", "PEAK", "MOVE_RIGHT", "MOVE_LEFT", "REST" };
00303     assert(s < state::NUM_STATES && s >= 0);
00304     return stab[s];
00305   }
00306 
00307   static size_t state_delay(state::state_t s) {
00308     static size_t sdtab[] = { 0, 0, 2, 2, 1 }; // by these amounts state changes are delayed
00309     return sdtab[s];
00310   }
00311 
00312   typedef enum {
00313     GF_LEFT   = 0,
00314     GF_CENTER = 1,
00315     GF_RIGHT  = 2,
00316     NUM_GF
00317   } gf_id_t;
00318   
00319   static std::string gf_id2str(gf_id_t id) {
00320     static std::string stab[] = { "GF_LEFT", "GF_CENTER", "GF_RIGHT" };
00321     assert(id < NUM_GF && id >= 0);
00322     return stab[id];
00323   }
00324 
00325   typedef std::complex<double> complex_t;
00326 
00327   static sptr make(double fs,              // sampling frequency (Hz)
00328                    double f0,              // center frequency (Hz)
00329                    double df,              // initial resolution (Hz): +- df
00330                    double min_df,          // maximal frequency resolution (Hz)
00331                    size_t max_hist_size,   // maximal size of history in seconds
00332                    size_t max_num_without_lock) {
00333     return sptr(new tracking_goertzel_filter(fs, f0, df, min_df, max_hist_size, max_num_without_lock));
00334   }
00335 
00336   double         fs_Hz()         const { return fs_; }
00337   state::state_t last_state()    const { return last_state_; }
00338   bool           state_updated() const { return filters_updated_ && last_state() != state::UNDEFINED;  }
00339   size_t         period()        const { return period_; }
00340   const detail::value_and_error& estimated_f_Hz() const { return estimated_f_; }
00341   const detail::value_and_error& estimated_df()   const { return estimated_df_; }  
00342   double        delta_time_sec() const { return delta_time_sec_; }
00343 
00344   void update(complex_t sample) {
00345     static size_t ccounter(0);
00346     ++ccounter;
00347     for (size_t i(0); i<NUM_GF; ++i)
00348       filters_updated_ = gfs_[i]->update(sample);
00349 
00350     if (!filters_updated_) return;
00351 
00352     double ampl[NUM_GF] = { 0 };
00353     // std::cout << "AMPL: ";    
00354     for (size_t i(0); i<NUM_GF; ++i) {
00355       ampl[i] = gfs_[i]->amplitude();
00356       // std::cout << "( " << ampl[i] << ", " << gfs_[i]->kN() << ", " << gfs_[i]->period() << " ) ";
00357     }
00358     // std::cout << std::endl;
00359     gfs_[GF_CENTER]->dump(ccounter);
00360 
00361     estimated_f_ = gfs_[GF_CENTER]->compute_f_est();
00362     delta_time_sec_ = -0.5*double(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->history_size())/fs_;
00363     if (0.0 == estimated_f_.value())
00364       estimated_f_ = detail::value_and_error(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN(), 0);
00365     if (0.0 == estimated_f_.rms_value())
00366       estimated_f_.set_rms_value(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN() - gfs_[GF_LEFT]->kN());
00367 
00368     // conversion: normalized frequency -> absolute frequency
00369     estimated_f_ *= fs_;
00370     // std::cout << "F_est= " << ccounter-gfs_[GF_CENTER]->history_size()/2 << " " << estimated_f_ << std::endl;
00371 
00372     // peak
00373     if (ampl[GF_CENTER] > ampl[GF_LEFT] &&
00374         ampl[GF_CENTER] > ampl[GF_RIGHT]) {
00375       const double sn(std::max(ampl[GF_CENTER]/ampl[GF_LEFT],
00376                                ampl[GF_CENTER]/ampl[GF_RIGHT]));
00377       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("Peak S/N=%f") % sn));
00378       // std::cout << str(boost::format("*** Peak S/N=%f") % sn) << std::endl;
00379       if (sn > 1.1 && period_ < max_period_ && gfs_[GF_CENTER]->history_size() > 5*period_) {
00380         period_ *= 2;
00381         const double kN_center(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN());
00382         gfs_[GF_LEFT]->update  (kN_center - 1./period_, period_);
00383         gfs_[GF_CENTER]->update(kN_center,              period_);
00384         gfs_[GF_RIGHT]->update (kN_center + 1./period_, period_);
00385       }
00386       last_state_ = state::PEAK;
00387     } else { 
00388       if (ampl[GF_LEFT]   > ampl[GF_CENTER] &&
00389           ampl[GF_CENTER] > ampl[GF_RIGHT]  &&
00390           ampl[GF_LEFT] / ampl[GF_CENTER] > 1.1) { // 3 2 1
00391         LOG_INFO("Move left");
00392         // std::cout << "*** Move left" << std::endl;
00393         if (period_ > min_period_ && last_state() == state::MOVE_LEFT) {
00394           period_ /= 2;
00395           const double kN_center(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN() - 1./period_);
00396           if (kN_center - 1./period_ > k_min_ &&
00397               kN_center + 1./period_ < k_max_) {
00398             std::swap(gfs_[GF_CENTER], gfs_[GF_RIGHT]);
00399             gfs_[GF_LEFT]->update  (kN_center - 1./period_, period_);
00400             gfs_[GF_CENTER]->update(kN_center,              period_);
00401             gfs_[GF_RIGHT]->update (kN_center + 1./period_, period_);
00402           }
00403         } else {
00404           const double kN_center(gfs_[GF_LEFT]->kN());
00405           if (kN_center - 1./period_ > k_min_ &&
00406               kN_center + 1./period_ < k_max_) {
00407             std::swap(gfs_[GF_CENTER], gfs_[GF_RIGHT]);
00408             std::swap(gfs_[GF_LEFT],   gfs_[GF_CENTER]);
00409             gfs_[GF_LEFT] =
00410               detail::gf_with_phase_hist::make(gf_id2str(GF_LEFT), kN_center - 1./period_, period_, max_history_size_);
00411           }
00412         }
00413         last_state_ = state::MOVE_LEFT;
00414       } else if (ampl[GF_LEFT]   < ampl[GF_CENTER] &&
00415                  ampl[GF_CENTER] < ampl[GF_RIGHT]  &&
00416                  ampl[GF_RIGHT]/ampl[GF_CENTER] > 1.1) { // 1 2 3
00417         LOG_INFO("Move right");
00418         // std::cout << "*** Move right" << std::endl;
00419         if (period_ > min_period_ && last_state() == state::MOVE_RIGHT) {
00420           // std::cout << "\tA" << std::endl;
00421           period_ /= 2;
00422           const double kN_center(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN() + 1./period_);
00423           if (kN_center - 1./period_ > k_min_ &&
00424               kN_center + 1./period_ < k_max_) {
00425             std::swap(gfs_[GF_LEFT], gfs_[GF_CENTER]);
00426             gfs_[GF_LEFT]->update  (kN_center - 1./period_, period_);
00427             gfs_[GF_CENTER]->update(kN_center,              period_);
00428             gfs_[GF_RIGHT]->update (kN_center + 1./period_, period_);
00429           }
00430         } else {
00431           // std::cout << "\tB" << std::endl;
00432           const double kN_center(gfs_[GF_RIGHT]->kN());
00433           if (kN_center - 1./period_ > k_min_ &&
00434               kN_center + 1./period_ < k_max_) {
00435             std::swap(gfs_[GF_LEFT],   gfs_[GF_CENTER]);
00436             std::swap(gfs_[GF_CENTER], gfs_[GF_RIGHT]);
00437             gfs_[GF_RIGHT] =
00438               detail::gf_with_phase_hist::make(gf_id2str(GF_RIGHT), kN_center + 1./period_, period_, max_history_size_);
00439           }
00440         }
00441         last_state_ = state::MOVE_RIGHT;
00442       } else {
00443         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("Rest %d %d") % period_ % min_period_));
00444         if (period_ > min_period_)// && last_state() == state::REST)
00445           period_ /= 2;
00446         const double kN_center(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN());
00447         if (kN_center - 1./period_ > k_min_ &&
00448             kN_center + 1./period_ < k_max_) {
00449           gfs_[GF_LEFT]->update  (kN_center - 1./period_, period_);
00450           gfs_[GF_CENTER]->update(kN_center,              period_);
00451           gfs_[GF_RIGHT]->update (kN_center + 1./period_, period_);
00452         }
00453         last_state_ = state::REST;
00454       }
00455     }    
00456     for (size_t i(0); i<NUM_GF; ++i)
00457       gfs_[i]->reset(gf_id2str(gf_id_t(i)));
00458 
00459     gfs_[GF_LEFT]  ->set_df(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN() - gfs_[GF_LEFT]->kN());
00460     gfs_[GF_CENTER]->set_df(0);
00461     gfs_[GF_RIGHT] ->set_df(gfs_[GF_CENTER]->kN() - gfs_[GF_RIGHT]->kN());
00462 
00463     if (last_state_ != state::PEAK)
00464       ++num_without_lock_;
00465     else
00466       num_without_lock_ = 0;
00467    
00468     if (num_without_lock_ > max_num_without_lock_)
00469       reset();
00470 
00471   }
00472 
00473 protected:
00474 private:
00475   tracking_goertzel_filter(double fs,            // sampling frequency (Hz)
00476                            double f0,            // center frequency (Hz)
00477                            double df,            // initial resolution (Hz): +- df
00478                            double min_df,        // maximal frequency resolution (Hz)
00479                            size_t max_hist_size, // maximal size of history in seconds
00480                            size_t max_num_without_lock) // max. number of iterations without lock
00481 
00482     : fs_(fs)
00483     , f0_(f0)
00484     , df_(df)
00485     , min_period_(size_t(0.5+fs/df))
00486     , max_period_(size_t(0.5+fs/min_df))
00487     , k_min_((f0-df)/fs)
00488     , k_max_((f0+df)/fs)
00489     , max_history_size_(size_t(0.5+fs*max_hist_size))
00490     , max_num_without_lock_(max_num_without_lock) {
00491     reset();
00492   }
00493 
00494   void reset() {
00495     period_           = size_t(0.5+fs_/df_);
00496     last_state_       = state::UNDEFINED;
00497     filters_updated_  = false;
00498     estimated_f_      = detail::value_and_error(f0_, df_);
00499     delta_time_sec_   = 0;
00500     num_without_lock_ = 0;
00501     const double f[NUM_GF] = { f0_-df_, f0_ , f0_+df_ };
00502     for (size_t i(0); i<NUM_GF; ++i)
00503       gfs_[i]   = detail::gf_with_phase_hist::make(gf_id2str(gf_id_t(i)),  f[i]/fs_, period_, max_history_size_);
00504   }
00505 
00506   const double    fs_;
00507   const double    f0_;
00508   const double    df_;
00509   size_t          period_;
00510   size_t          min_period_;
00511   size_t          max_period_;
00512   const double    k_min_; // lower bound in normalized frequency
00513   const double    k_max_; // upper bound in normalized frequency
00514   detail::gf_with_phase_hist::sptr gfs_[NUM_GF];
00515   bool            filters_updated_;
00516   state::state_t  last_state_;
00517   size_t          state_counter_;  // used to delay switching the state
00518   detail::value_and_error estimated_f_;
00519   detail::value_and_error estimated_df_;
00520   double          delta_time_sec_; // time offset of frequency measurement [sec]
00521   //   phase_vector_t  phases_;
00522   const size_t    max_history_size_;
00523   size_t          history_size_;
00524   size_t          num_without_lock_;
00525   const size_t    max_num_without_lock_;
00526 } ;
